normalised: Arre yaar, mhojem current-achem bill hea mhoinyan rupiya teen hazar panchshe zalem! Fattim mhoinyan tem fokot rupiya don hazar aslem. Zait mhanun hanvem A-C chaluuch chodd vell dourlem? Priya kodden vicharchem poddttelem, ti sodanch sokol mollachi options sodta. Rajeshin sanglen ki B-S-E-S kissam toranche cashback ditam julaychea pondhra tarikhe adim bhortok zalear. Te khatren gheun hanv te zuroor check kortam, natar mhojem pocket money hea mhoinyak gel'lem!
